Title: 39332 - A Checklist For Visiting NYC For The First Time
Direction: 500 Words. In 3-6 subheaders, create a checklist for someone who is visiting NYC for the first time. Tips on what to pack, what to see and do, etc. You can also talk about making sure you book the right hotel. You can mention the client URL when you're talking about hotel booking. Your target audience is people visiting NYC for the first time.
Extra Writer Notes: A link to Touring NYC Sports will be included in this article. Please bold the anchor text you'd like to use for this link.
